name: B'omarr Monk
Lore: 'Members of a mysterious religious sect. Resentful of their monastery being taken over by Jabba. Shed their bodies and have their brains encased in a walking automaton.',
Text: 'While at a site, adds Force icons to equalize them for both sides. Cancels opponent''s Jabba''s Palace game text where present. Can not use vehicles, starships, weapons, or devices. Participates only in defensive battles. Lost if not on Tatooine.',
